import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from "reactstrap"; import {Link }from "react-router-dom"; import '../styles/tour-card.css' const TourCard = ( { tour }) =>{ const { id, title, city, photo, price, featured, avgRating,reviews } = tour; return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{" "} ( {reviews.length})
{title}
${price}/Per Person
) } export default TourCard
